title: Arrests after two men stabbed in Tottenham
content:
Two 20-year-old men have been stabbed in Tottenham. 
 
One of the men was also arrested following the incident in Bronhill Terrace, off Lansdowne Road, in Tottenham last night. 
 
Both the men were treated at an east London hospital – their injuries are said to be non-life threatening. 
   
 Share article  
   
Another man, also 20, has been arrested in connection with the incident and is in custody at an east London police station. 
 
Detectives from the gangs unit are investigating the incident and appealing for any witnesses to get in touch.
